results.text: Our company policy states that all employees must follow safety protocols when working in laboratory environments. This includes wearing appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) such as safety goggles, lab coats, and gloves.
Remote work policies allow employees to work from home up to 3 days per week with manager approval. All remote workers must maintain secure VPN connections and follow cybersecurity guidelines.

The annual performance review process begins in January and concludes by March. Employees will receive feedback from supervisors and peers, with ratings based on goal achievement and core competencies.

API documentation: To authenticate with our REST API, include the Bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: Authorization: Bearer your-token-here
Database schema: The users table contains columns: id (primary key), email (unique), password_hash, created_at, updated_at. Foreign key relationships exist with the profiles table.
Company policies apply to all employees regardless of location. Les politiques de l'entreprise s'appliquent à tous les employés, peu importe leur emplacement.

results.text: This is an extremely long document that contains a lot of detailed information about various topics and procedures that might be relevant to the user's query.

The content covers historical context, current implementations, future plans, technical specifications, business requirements, and operational procedures.
This type of lengthy content tests the formatting and truncation capabilities of the RAGE system to ensure it can handle large documents gracefully without overwhelming the LLM context window.
